bio: Hui-Ching Lu is currently a Language Lecturer for the Chinese Language Program at NYU Shanghai. She received her Master’s degree from National Cheng Kung University in Taiwan. Her research interests include applied linguistics, second-language acquisition, and TESOL, specialized in computer-mediated language learning. Before teaching at NYU Shanghai, she taught Chinese at Colby College in Maine, USA for four years. During the summer in 2017, she also taught Chinese in Princeton in Beijing Program.
